changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_TIMESERIES_JOB', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_TIMESERIES_JOB', 'PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_JOB';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_JOB', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbReportingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_JOB', 'PK_TIMESERIES_JOB';
